original: unfold simulation. intros A X Y TX TY F HF R HR. unfold simulation_t. intros R S HR' HS. apply (mkctrl A X Y TX TY (F R)). - intros R' HR''. apply (mon_m A X Y TX TY F HF). apply (mon_t A X Y TX TY F HF). + auto. + apply trans_incl with (Y := F S). * apply IH. apply R. apply H. * apply IH. apply R'. apply H. - intros R'' S' HR'' HS' HRS' Hincl. apply (mon_a A X Y TX TY F HF). + auto. + apply HRS'. apply trans_incl with (Y := F R). * apply IH. apply S'. apply H. * apply trans_incl with (Y := F S). -- apply IH. apply R. apply H. -- apply IH. apply R''. apply H.
